data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Invoice Items Sub Total'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
define root view entity ZETR_DDL_I_INV_SUB_TTL
  as select from zetr_t_r102                    as ExportInvoiceHeader
    inner join   ZETR_DDL_C_EXPORT_INVOICE_ITEM as InvoiceItem on InvoiceItem.BillingDocument = ExportInvoiceHeader.vbeln
{
  key ExportInvoiceHeader.filen       as ExportNumber,
  key ExportInvoiceHeader.vbeln       as Invoice,
      InvoiceItem.TransactionCurrency as TransactionCurrency,

      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      cast(
            coalesce( sum( cast( InvoiceItem.Subtotal1Amount as abap.decfloat34 ) ), 0 )
          + coalesce( sum( cast( InvoiceItem.Subtotal2Amount as abap.decfloat34 ) ), 0 )
          + coalesce( sum( cast( InvoiceItem.Subtotal3Amount as abap.decfloat34 ) ), 0 )
          + coalesce( sum( cast( InvoiceItem.Subtotal4Amount as abap.decfloat34 ) ), 0 )
          + coalesce( sum( cast( InvoiceItem.Subtotal5Amount as abap.decfloat34 ) ), 0 )
          + coalesce( sum( cast( InvoiceItem.Subtotal6Amount as abap.decfloat34 ) ), 0 )
        as abap.decfloat34
      )                               as TotalSubtotalAmount
}
group by
  ExportInvoiceHeader.filen,
  ExportInvoiceHeader.vbeln,
  InvoiceItem.TransactionCurrency
/*+[internal] {
